summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Mayor to execute an agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle for preconstruction and construction activities on the Downtown Seattle Transit Project; authorizing the acceptance of funds to be received; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1987 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; and making partially reimbursable appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating and Transit Funds therefor.
